lines.text: Are the horses still going to move on Caduceus' turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The horses move at initiative count 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just for ease of maintaining it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is right after Caleb and Caduceus I believe, right? What did you roll for initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. So it's right above you. It's before you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or 16. Was it 16?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys rolled 16, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's before Caleb, sorry. So after your turn the horses will move, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. What do I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I can get to one of them for sure. I can get to that one, but can I get to that one over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 45 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement's 45 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can definitely get to this guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you're on your own.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're on your own. And we're moving at speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so we are moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cart's moving regardless. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go right in the middle in between them, behind the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, back. Yeah. Back a little more, towards you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. There?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Then I'm going to take the dodge action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Patient Defense or dodge action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take the dodge action. Can I hold my attack if I take the dodge action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's holding your action, holding would be doing that and bonus action--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Patient Defense? Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, bonus action, Patient Defense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action as soon as one of them is close enough to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're readying an attack for when one of them gets close enough to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. All right, that ends Beau's turn. The horses now move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be back in a few hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys go. Keep going, keep going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got Flintstone feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That brings us to Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away-- oh boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That change things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is going to jump out of the back of the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Caleb, no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) That's one way to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has its own narrative with the death of the minis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move to here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as I'm moving forward, I'm pulling out a pinch of iron powder. And I let go of it, and pull my fingers apart, and Beau again becomes Swoleregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh snap!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will use the rest of my movement, I think it's five or ten feet more, then to back away towards the cart once I've done it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where's the mini?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's big Beau?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't let them down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I painted it, but I'm trying to remember, with the move, where it got put.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why I did this, so I could see the big mini, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! I'm so angry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this the same day as we disguised ourselves, or have we had a sleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From when we got the bag of jewels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a couple hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Just making sure that-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, from the jewels? Yeah, it's been a few days from that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's been days?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From the jewels? Okay, so yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If anyone in production wants to look for big Beau minis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, good luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fuck, this would be the time to unveil it, but nevertheless, here we are with the chaos of the past few weeks of moving. Next time! There's big Beau, taking up all that space. All right, and for the remainder of your movement, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Backing up towards the cart, jogging backwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get up against the cart, but not into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep, doing that backward jog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your go. Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out that thing that I can do where I can make someone vulnerable to terrible things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's your Channel Divinity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm trying to find it. Ah, Path of the Grave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. What's the range on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm too far away. It's 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you'd have to get closer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really frustrating. So I'm just going to do what I can do from this distance, which is Sacred Flame, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, against which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I always take the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, left one over here, you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, on my left. That one, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is a natural 19 wisdom save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex save? Oh, that's a 18. Still makes it, though. So no effect, unfortunately. It sees it coming and ducks out of the way, and the burst of divine energy explodes in the middle of the air, to no effect. That's your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my action. Yeah, that's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's now their turn. The two ettins rolled a 15 and a 14 initiative. This one here is going to go ahead and just run past. It's going to go over on this end, that's (counting).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For fuck's sake!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40 and then dash. (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So much better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Optimus Prime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it. Now that's Swoleregard right there! I worked so hard to paint it, and then it never came up, and the moment it did, I was so sad. Thank you, Max!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Mighty Nein, roll out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy is going to go ahead and just go back and forth on this. That one over there makes no action, but it's coming right up to the cart and it has both of its weapons out. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can attack as soon as he comes up to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you can. You get two attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that's balls. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten does not hit. Ducks out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Gil. Fuck you, Gil!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so now you do actually make impact, and your fist hits the stomach, and it hits what feels like solid stone with a layer of blubber as you watch it kind of ripple around the tummy. One head goes, (snarling) and the other goes (chuckling), and they both focus on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You need to work out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then both heads go, "Hmm?", and look momentarily insecure, before they go, "No, we don't!" and they're going to take two strikes at you with disadvantage because of your Patient Defense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They can't see us, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they can still hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god! Oh Jesus, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like right above you. You look up on it-- it doesn't see you. It hasn't focused on anyone in the cart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're all doing the (sharp inhale).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One head's looking at Caleb and the other one's looking at Caduceus, and both weapons are raising up, one for each of them. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I do? I'm going to take two swings with the Summer Dance falchion at that guy right next to us. That does not-- that's a 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 hits. They're big. They don't have a lot of armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's great. And 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Summer Dance!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Summer Dance! Summer Dance now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's nine points of damage on the first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Everybody summer dance now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's five points of damage on the second, so 13 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 total.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with my bonus action, can I cast Hex Blade's Curse at the guy standing right next to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As its head, which is the size of your body, leans forward and grins, the horrible stench of its terrible breath pour in, you instinctually let loose the curse, and you watch as the shadows leap up into its face. And it backs up a bit, and the shadows now have coalesced around the corners of its jaw and the inside of its muscular and flabby torso. The curse has taken a hold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I turn and say: save the cart, scatter! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, that ends your turn, Fjord. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, that's me! Okay. I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon as a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Where are you putting it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right above his head so I can smack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's another Critter-made gift here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Look at that cutie. Look, it's going to smack him on the butt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's another of the floating lollipop. Go ahead and make an attack with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Go ahead and roll your damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's just a one, so that's five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage with the Spiritual Weapon. (smacks) on the back of the shoulders, and you still have your action to do a cantrip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run forward and touch him and cast Inflict Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two spells in the same round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do a cantrip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cantrip him. Damn it. I'm going to cast Toll the Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's a-- what save?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom. That is a nine. He does not succeed, so go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, 2d12! That doesn't count because it jumped out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a shame, it was a good roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a shame, I know. Woo! Two nines, 18 points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of damage! So after getting slammed in the back of the head on the left side--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One bell for each head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both (groan), and you watch as dark brackish blood pour out of the ears of each head as they rear back from the impact. That end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I jump out of the cart and run towards the horses. On the opposite side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Jester leaves the cart and then join the horses there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I got to run past the horses, because I know they're going to catch up with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) So you're now-- you might want to be there. So you're not going to be trampled by them. I know. That ends your turn. Back up to the top of the round. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, but I'm not hidden anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he just looked in and saw you. Even though you're hidden in the illusion, it's aware of your presence and your basic location.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Fjord's right next to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's true. Fjord's engaged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord is engaged. Technically, so are you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will-- sneak attack still? Yes, no, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you manage to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't suffer ranged in melee.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will shootsky. Yeah, so that's 20 something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Wow, good roll. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 to hit or 21 damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that does it. All right, cool. As it's pulled back, the impact of the bells, it's almost reaching up instinctually, though it's holding weapons, it can't really plug its ears, so it kind of uninstinctually bashes into each head a little with its own fist. And as it pulls back, you see that one little exposed bit of the throat on the one on the right, and you release it and it (gasps), that horrible sucking sound as it's jammed into its trachea. It's (gasping for air), and the other head's like, (gibberish) which you hear as, "Stop complaining." So that's your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I will use Disengage and hop off the cart and try to run up next to Jester. You're on your own, Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said scatter!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're on deck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grab my hands behind this guy's head, and just give him a full knee-- right thigh/knee, head right into the knee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage, and it's a constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is an eight, he does not succeed. He is stunned. You can grab one head and then with the other head grab the other, and pull them down, like slapping two heads together in The Three Stooges thing, but into your knee. They both (groaning) and one of them like drops the club on one side and its hand reaches up to try and grab the face and it's just all sorts of discombobulated. So continue your round. You have advantage on your attacks now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am now going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget to roll your extra d4 for damage, because you're big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Thanks, Caleb. Extra one point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine, better than eight. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In most countries.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am now going to attempt to, with that knee, give a full front kick and try and knock him prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's an athletics check, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, so you're using an action to try and shove?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because I have advantage on athletics checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, you fucking--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 17 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No wait, sorry. 16, but that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural two. Even then, he's stunned, so he would have-- it doesn't say anything about athletics or trying to escape it. Yeah, it doesn't matter. He's down. So you trip the legs out from under him with like a low sweep and a shove, (crash) onto the ground, weapons clattering to the middle of the ravine to each side of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to turn and I'm going to run, full sprint, towards that guy. My 45 speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 45, you get right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bonus action, Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So glad we got to use big Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She is, man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack, I'm just going to do both of them. Natural one. So I'll take that natural 18, which is three plus another three, six plus four, so nine damage.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Six plus four is ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, we are so done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're so baked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So one head is pulled back, and another head peeks around the other head goin--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With a Flurry of Blows, can I also try and make that a Stunning Strike? Can I double down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's nothing that says you can't. You would have to spend more ki points to try, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to try and stun them with that first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that, or is it too far beyond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, but you weren't aware of it. So we can try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm okay, if it's too late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it does resist the Stunning Strike, but good try. That ends Beau's go. Caleb, you're up and then Caduceus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if this is going to hit me, but I'm going to risk going this way away from it up onto the gray stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it is not stunned, it does get a reaction. So as you're pulling back, it swings high with its club as it's currently dropped the battleaxe. That's going to be a natural 15 plus eight. That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caduceus, you have to heal him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of piercing damage, as this club swings over with its jagged rocks and bits of stone and root.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, you're going to throw it at him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's swung back and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten feet of reach, probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get my Sentinel attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It hits. It's a natural 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, monks with Sentinel. They're nasty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two plus four, plus my extra four. That's six plus three is nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, nice. With this one, you crack again. The hit slams into Caleb's back, sending him flying and shoulder-rolling, sliding onto the ground and barely getting back up, knocked a bit for a loop from the impact. You don't notice that; as you see the swing hit Caleb, instinctually, you slam your elbow right into the ribcage. You hear multiple cracks as you get a good solid six or seven inches into the torso with your elbow as you shatter parts of the ribcage there. (groaning) This guy's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I'm not done, so, pushing myself up and trying to focus on the one on the ground and seeing double, hand on the glove, tighten it, and I'm going to release three rays from it and-- hit the mic first-- and then hit the ettin on the ground. Is that at advantage because he's down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's at disadvantage because he's prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do it anyway. First one is ten, doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Third one is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two hit. Go ahead and roll 4d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh! I made six, six, one, one. So 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of fire damage. As one of them fires off to the side and hits a stone (crackling), sending bits of rock and dust off to the side, the two other ones slam into the sides of the ettin who's currently trying to find its way up, but it has no ability to move its muscles, its body still tense from the Stunning Strike, which actually would have given him advantage on the attack because he's stunned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it would have evened out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I forgot that, so roll one more roll for the first one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First thing I'm going to do is I'm going to tap my staff and say, "Time to get out, "children." I'm going to bring a little nest of creatures right on the back of his business right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like onto his wenis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they get everywhere. It's a swarm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were in jail when this happened last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, from the back of the cart, riding it, slams his staff into the top of the cart and beetles begin to swarm out of the staff-- they've been living on the inside-- and then (fluttering, buzzing) scooting over and begin swarming and biting and attacking the side of the ettin as it's currently being consumed by the shadow and everything around it. Go ahead and roll an attack for the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is the attack for that, by the way? I think I might have that here, hold on, where is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Should be in the staff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been acting a little weird. It doesn't give me the attack stuff for it, because it's not linked to it properly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, weird. Yeah, it's blanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's unfortunate. Here, I'll find it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Swarm of Beetles. Go ahead and roll a bite attack. It's a d20 plus three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten total? That misses. The beetles are climbing up the side of its body, but they're unable to penetrate the thick, giantkin skin. It doesn't seem to mind so much as they haven't been able to get into any sort of sensitive tissue, but you can see this dark cluster, as the beetles are beginning to form up the right side of its body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the British Invasion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to need a little bit more. I turn to one of the beetles and, "Make him feel this," and have the beetle bite me and then swarms and attacks him. I'm casting Bane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The beetle bit you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, because the beetle brings my blood. I have to spill blood for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Bane voice) Oh, sorry, giantkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the three creatures in range, 30 feet, yeah, it's only going to hit the one guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It only can hit the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Charisma saving throw. Natural 19 minus one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! I'm sorry. It succeeds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But hey, you saw a lot of things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. Oh, you avoided this, this ambush could have been a lot more harrowing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, we're doing good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were going to do some actual carnage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay, I'm just going to spend a spell slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's their-- oh, actually, and the horses are trying to push forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! Jester got run over!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Jester got run over by a reindeer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The horses know who our friends are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. This guy is no longer stunned. Oh no-- he's stunned until the end of your turn. I remember that. So he's still stunned; he can't do anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he was dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's just on the ground, stunned, prone, and like (groans).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's much less damaged than the other guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other guy is going to go ahead and move--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't suppose the other swarms get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they do not. He's going to move forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm going to buy an extra reaction, for Sentinel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going to use a ki point to buy an extra reaction. Make an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep this motherfucker from going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's one of the abilities of the class, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So he doesn't get to move, does he?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he does not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sentinel and this class in particular is a really good synergy. Do you want to make a monk tank?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine damage, and he doesn't get to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine damage. How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he doesn't move!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As he's trying to run away, and since I'm big Beau, and I can do this, I just go: Oh, nope, no! And I stick my leg out, and trip him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Onto the ground, both faces (crashing) into the stone and rock below you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want to Three Stooges trip him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hits, and he stops moving, and you're like, "Why is--? Like, how bad was it?" You kick the body over a little bit, with your large Beau form, pull it back, and there is a cluster of sharpened stones in the ground that both faces fell onto, and pierced into the skull. There's a trail of crimson coming out of the gap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was real convenient, guys. Did you see that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (deep voice) That was real convenient, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep voice) That was deeper than for real.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get the fuck out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Beau's turn, that guy's no longer stunned. All right. That brings us to Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I just got done seeing the T-Rex above my head, and big-ass Fjord knock it down and kill it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That wasn't Beau's turn, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, Beau's reaction. That was the ettin's turn. One of them got unstunned, and the-- I'm sorry, it wasn't Beau's turn, so it's still stunned, actually. That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still stunned, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Happy to be out of death's doorway, I'm going to send two Eldritch Blasts towards the guy on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. That's just a straight roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 just hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just hits, great, okay. 1d10. That's seven and nine. So 16 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord's staying inside. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, okay. I'm going to send my Spiritual Weapon over. Does it get there? Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as close as it gets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hit one guy, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I within 120 feet of the guy that's down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to cast Guiding Bolt at... 3rd-level, fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. Go ahead and roll-- it's a straight attack roll, thanks to him being stunned and prone, so they cancel out the advantage and disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, Guiding Bolt. Hold on, I'm sorry, I can't tell what's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guiding Bolt. Okay. Okay, that does hit, that's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll some damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him. Kill him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa. I love it when a line-up like that happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was only five, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was five, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Six plus ten is 16, 23, plus one more... 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage. Nice. Jester pulls back, clutching the symbol of the Traveler around her neck--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's on my waist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you can see, from the impact, the energy seems to expand and then contract to it, and you can now see the sparkles, as now Guiding Bolt gives advantage to the next attack against it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And any movement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hop back on the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Hop back up on the cart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Fjord, did you see that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw it, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was pretty cool, huh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that was pretty cool. Got a little pee in my pants right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Oh gods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be stopping the carts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to be stopping the cart? With that thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This guy's going to be trashed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! All right, I'll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's big enough to still be in the battlefield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, well then, I'm going to run up to the dead body and hide behind it. Or in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not a corpse to hide into, but there's a wound that you can--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'll hold my action until the other one starts moving towards us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. That ends Nott's turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And bonus action hide back there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Beau, your turn. Caleb, you're up next with Caduceus on deck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're holding your action until--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It moves towards us, within 30 feet, basically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Within 30 feet-- I'm probably more than 45 feet away. I'd have to run up and-- I'm just going to, from here, take out one of my throwing darts and throw that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 feet-- oh, I'm not within 30 feet, am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Is that the minimum range? What's the full range?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Darts--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a very long range on them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like 25 without-- it's fine. I'm just going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 20/60, so 60-foot long range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But Guiding Bolt, so it's advantage. So it's just a regular roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm going to wait for Nott for that Guiding Bolt with advantage. I'm going to run towards the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (thuds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go away! Oh, hey Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep voice) It's just me, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! It's another giant!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's so much bigger than she used to be!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, I'm going to back up five feet away, and as I do so, I'm going to pull some bat shit out of one pocket and some sulfur in the other and slap them together, and then stick my hands out and cast Fireball at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit! It's the first Fireball of the campaign!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Bat shit and sulfur.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that have advantage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a different kind. It's a dex save, but he's stunned, so I imagine he's not going to do too well. He's still prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that was the end of Beau's turn, you're right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so he gets to shake it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he's prone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oof. Drop the fucking--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that consumes him. He has disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, prone doesn't give any changes to dexterity. That's a natural five minus one for his dex save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, no. That is a no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 8d6 fire damage to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I came in like a Fireball!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a total of 16 fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, naked, riding the Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb sends out this tiny bead of red energy, quietly streaks over, and then (explosion) detonates, this loud explosion that rocks the center of the ravine. It echoes out through the mountainous area (explosion echoing). As the flames die down, you can see the ettin on the ground (groaning). Its outside is now charred and burnt. It looks very hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still alive?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I go five feet back from where I was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I feel very caffeinated right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I within 60 feet of the guy on the ground? The one that's far away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Him? No, you are not. You are more than that away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way I can get within 60 feet of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could get within 60 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to tell the horses to whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he won't. Even at his full 30-foot movement, he'll be just beyond the 60-foot range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to tell the horses to whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They slow down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to tell my beetles to keep munching on that guy who's on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do. They begin to consume the eyes and the ears, and whatever immediately soft, available flesh is there, the beetles begin to dine on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope they're in his junk!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold my-- I'm so sorry, this is a new spell I'm learning. Stop, there we go. I'm going to hold Channel Divinity until the one on the ground's within 30 feet of me. I'm going to whoa the horses and hold Channel Divinity until there's a creature within 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. It is now the ettin's turn. The ettin (grunts).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to move to the front of the cart too, so I'm right there next to everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you've moved over to this position there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where Jester is, at this little stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all-- Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Self-preservation has kicked in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If no one does anything else, I will send another Fireball 150 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's running up the mountains and like (grunting), looking over its shoulder like, "Mmm. (laughing)!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I have such an easy target at his back, I give a little bit of a curveball to it, and I make the fireball beam of red go (whirring) (explosion) and erupt about 15 feet back, and just burn the backside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like one of those cartoons, like, (distant explosion, fwoosh). Yeah, the wind blows past you guys. Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those fireworks rivaled Hupperdook's.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not great, but at least we're not under attack. A ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. So as you're all like, "That was incredible," you look back and Caleb's still standing there, hands extended.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau goes over to Caleb--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're still huge? Oh! Nope. Yeah, you're huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pick Caleb up, and throw him over my shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Enlarge still in place if I'm out of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're still concentrating on the spell. Unless you choose otherwise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on Caleb as he's walking by in this state.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, do you want to get on the other shoulder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, hold on. Does stun break concentration? I imagine it would.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So Beau, you go pick up Caleb. As you do, your form shrinks down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh! I'm fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he's a wispy fellow, you (whump) over your shoulder; fireman's carry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just going to pick up Nott!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can squat that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could probably still curl Nott while holding Caleb. You're pretty strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you shaking so much, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shakily) It's all good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, I'm going to go over and cast Decompose on that one that's-- See what pops out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beetles have made rather quick work of all of the eyes and elements of softer flesh, and as you cast Decompose, the body softens a bit and the gaps in the back where the rigid structure had left air between itself and the ground come to close as the body sloughs a bit off of its tightened structure. You watch quickly as where it normally was very rocky terrain, bits of green begin to emerge: vines seem to slowly wrap up over parts of its dead form, and within bits of the wounds that you guys had left in it from your various hacks and attacks against its body, you see bits of reddish fungus begin to pop out and fill the various wounds. Nothing too intense, it begins the process.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a handful and give it a smell. (sniff) Mmm. Look at that, he's useful now. That's good; that's so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blood fungus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah! I'm going to go get back on the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything on the giant's body? Worthy of stealing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man. Dig your fingers into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24? You loot through his body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find eight gold pieces, 34 silver pieces, and half of an eaten goat that was dangling from the back of its belt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goat meat's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's great when it's fresh. You can smell the week of ripening that this half-goat has been through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot of medieval cooking that would want the meat to get a little gamy, I'm just saying. Sometimes it improves the flavor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I flick off some of the beetles off of the goat meat. That's mine! Get off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beetles eventually recoil back into the staff. So you guys gather yourselves back up into the cart, keeping a very close eye on the rest of the walls of this gorge as you continue your journey. You push beyond this brief encounter. So it's about four and a half days of travel to Nicodranas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, we're going halfway across the world!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're traveling a long way, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long did it take for Caleb to come out of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It took about a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A minute. I should probably stop doing that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (straining) Ugh. Can I set you down now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to set you down now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Let's go catch the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys rush up and hop into the cart, continuing your journey. For this next day or so, Caduceus, make a perception check for me, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll help you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, with Jester's aid, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 17. It'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the morning comes to, you all begin to wake up to the sound of approaching hoofprints.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It wouldn't be mottled or anything, it would be still slightly abnormal because it would be one solid color. If we are in a stony area, I would try to match the gray. Just something I add to my routine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough. As you guys come to and wake up, off the side of the main path, you glance over to the right, and you can see, from the sound of hoof prints, two carts, 30 or 40 feet off the side, heading up the road. At the front, you see a-- I wouldn't say cloaked, but hooded man with a head wrap that falls into a scarf over one shoulder, a long, gray-and-gold set of comfortable travel robes sat at the front, who's looking over in your direction. In the back of the cart, you see numerous sizes of metallic cages of some kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there people in them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a zoo. It's a traveling zoo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. No people. You do see a number of creatures; little animals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a traveling zoo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of creatures?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's a petting zoo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance, you can see a number of small, feathered, winged creatures on perches on the inside of one cage. You can see on the back cart-- just from this distance, you can't make out too much from this, but you can see two small, furred creatures that are both circling each other in the cage in the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go take a look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he stopped, or is he moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's moving. Just glancing over, and noticing this weird, green dome off to the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Call to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you emerge from the dome?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Morning!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good morning."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have animals in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you-- Are they nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are very nice, they are very young, and they are ripe for finding someone who would "wish to give them the attention and training they deserve."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp) Wait, wait, wait! Can we pet them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but you may look to purchase if you're interested."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! I run over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look to purchase, Jester! Just look!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got to see this, I'm getting up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got this smile, and his eyes are very welcoming. There are two other figures that are walking alongside the cart that appear to be keepers that are just keeping an eye on the creatures. You can see there are a number of small bags and things that contain food and general means of keeping these animals. And as you approach and look, these animals are kept in fairly good conditions; they're not-- they don't look abused or anything, they're just being brought. He, as they're stopping the horses, steps off, pulls back the wrap from his head, and it's a smooth, bald head with a little bit of stubble coming in around the sides. You can see he's mostly gone bald on the top. He smiles. "Well, it is a pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am "Kestiff Drudy. I am a handler of creatures of fantastical possible talent, and we travel along "these routes to find homes for these majestic creatures. If you are looking to purchase, we can "give you a quick view of our wares."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say Drudy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kestiff Drudy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so excited for a show.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, Caleb has stayed behind. He has no interest; he is keeping the hut up and petting his own cat and watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just watching from a hidden position.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kestiff, where are you coming from and where are you heading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, I had previously been traveling from Port Damali and making our way from port town "to port town. We had just left from Nicodranas and are making our way upwards, hopefully to "Rexxentrum, with the various creatures we have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a lot of guards blocking the entrance into the Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why would they block it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a war going on, didn't you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I heard about that, but do they not want commerce?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you're going to probably get rustled a bit, but I'm sure they'll let you in eventually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are carrying nothing illegal. We have been very particular to make sure the creatures we "bring across are within the legalities of the Empire. Should not be a problem, but appreciate "the warning."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of animals do you have? I want one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well!" and giving a display, the two other helpers begin opening one cage in the far back, and you can see the two creatures they pull on the side as they walk over with two very young tiger cubs.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orange and white with black stripes across their back. "These are twin cubs. The last of "their litter to be given birth to, naught but about six weeks before."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Twin cups! (clinks)

lines.text: "If you would like to make a home for either of these, they are 70 gold apiece. Or, if you want "to buy them as a pair, merely 120 gold."

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That face. That face! Oh, that face! Look at that face! Sweet tiger cubs, into that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I should probably hold them to see if they will like me or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course. Here." Takes one cub and hands it to you. And they look like they had woken up not long before, and they're like (tiny growling). Big paws that are kind of oversized for their physicality. Hands the other one over to you, and as he hands the other one over, this one is kind of climbing up your shoulder, gets a little rambunctious and is across the back and shoulder area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're so cute on you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, should we have some tigers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing) "Should we have some--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They look very happy with you, I'm not going to lie."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am really happy with them!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps there is something else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is very judgmentally petting his cat's head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What else do you have, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have Jamyela, who is in need of a home and some care." And he points over to another cage, and you can see an older baboon. You can see the orangish-red fur fading to gray. It looks older. You can see the drooping skin. It has one arm up, holding onto a branch in the cage, and looks over and it's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Well, she is... unique. Maybe a bit of a big personality, but overall, very useful and--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is his way of saying she sucks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much is she, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "45 gold for her."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I could probably get all three. What else do you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have," and he turns--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit her with a Sleep spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can see two of the helpers have gone into one of the larger cages and pulled out these leather cords they keep wrapped around a finger with these little loops that are affixed to the legs of these three smaller, kind of parrot-like birds. "This is a blue dollop," and sets it over onto the edge there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, put it on my horn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the horn. "This is a purple-feathered joppie," and hands it over to you. "This is a "yellow-white kurat," and the third bird is placed over onto your other hand. "These run about 20-- "No, these are 15 gold pieces apiece for these birds."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's like nothing, really.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beau's hard shell drops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, they're basically free.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes the cubs from you and puts them back in the cage. "We also have--" and points over to an owl--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, he's got more!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see an owl, a large owl in one of the far back cages that is kind of like curled up. You can see in the daylight, it's now hitting the end of its conscious cycle. The head (ratchets) and just stays in the cage. "The owl is 20 gold pieces." You hear this (sharp call) from the back cage, and you can see this vibrant green peacock that is in one of the further back carts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a fucking good peacock sound!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what they sound like!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin! Taliesin, this one's for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it kind of sitting in the cage--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're bastards, those birds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is a crimson weasel."

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is 20 gold pieces for the crimson weasel--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I need to hold the weasel. I'm thinking about buying the weasel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They go ahead and take the bird off of your horn and begin to retrieve the other birds off of Beau and take them back to the cage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I trade you these two birds for that owl? Can I hold the owl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes over and opens the owl cage, gets a heavy leather glove on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I'm really holding these animals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gets a heavy leather glove on, and then reaches in to get the owl, and it takes about three or four minutes to eventually nudge it to get onto the arm, and the owl is just fucking not having any of it, and is like, "(growl) No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, if you buy the owl and I buy a weasel, is your owl going to eat my weasel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will the owl eat the weasels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is a reason we keep them in separate cages, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, can we teach them to be friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is up to you. I cannot guarantee success in this endeavor, but you are welcome to "try. Being a natural predator of the crimson weasel, I would not recommend it. But it is your purchase."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of like a challenge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's going to be a dead pet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hold it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many times did you hear that at your mom's house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: of creature, is the best way I can describe it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of like a mix between Nott and Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's almost citrusy, but like fermented citrus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ferret smell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Similar to a ferret smell, kind of? It makes its way up the arm and curls up and nestles into you. It's pretty soft.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like, a soft, kind of brown puppy with a bit of full--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing? Are you crazy?! What the fuck is the matter with you?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "This one is 100 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What can it do? What is it trained to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it is trained to stay within its cage. Because when it gets excited--" and he pulls it over towards you and the tail kind of wags, and then it (poof) vanishes from his hand, and then (poof) appears on the ground next to you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasp) Blink dog! Blink-- Motherfucking blink dog! I mean, I'm not there. (pigeon cooing) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Appears on the ground next to you, and is like, "Arf. Arf, arf!" and kind of curls up and starts nibbling on your boot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much is this one?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is 100 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 100 gold! For a cute blinky dog?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the owl the natural predator of blink dogs? Or would the owl--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. The dog is too-- the dog will get larger, I will warn you. It gets to--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will the dog eat the owl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably not, unless it--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much for the dog and the owl?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want the dog for sure. Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're getting an owl?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a bird of prey that you have to wear a glove to handle. How awesome is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you do with an owl during a fight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much is the weasel again? How much for the weasel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The crimson weasel is 20 gold pieces. The blink puppy is 100 gold pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taliesin and Caduceus have very conflicting feelings right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you ever eaten tiger before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should split the dog, and we can have a pet together, and he can room with us whenever we go anywhere. And then you can get your owl--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never been so disappointed to have rolled a vegetarian character in my entire life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's my question: what do we do with all these animals? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a very good question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to get them, but what do we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did you put this in front of us, Matt? Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know exactly why. Because it's funny! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't, either. We could get them and just figure it out as we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could figure it out. We'll have pets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to lose that puppy. It's going to blink itself off a cliff and you're never going to be the same. You're going to be devastated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that blink dog is cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just watch it die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys all right? Is this all on the level? I'm just going to check with the animals that everything is copacetic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make a nature check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. Looking over all of them, all the animals are well-kept.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I asked them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, you asked them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I just asked them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are not—"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do the animals seem like they're cool with this too? I was talking to the animals

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you were talking to the animals. I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Think how effective an animal companion was when you were a ranger, and now you have none of those skills.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The best that you can make out from them, they—

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not freaking out at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're enjoying the fresh air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the attention. Mostly. The owl doesn't want to fucking deal with any of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the owl on me? I have the owl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have the glove on? Do I have the dope glove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he didn't give you the glove.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He didn't give me the glove? I just have him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could take it, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I've got my wraps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well, you have your bracers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have awesome bracers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's talon into forearm, let's just be honest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look cool on my bracers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looks as pissed as you look all the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, right? Yeah? Can I pet?

lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, don't lose that fucking digit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, he's going to eat my—

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is revenge for all the times Dagon bit us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked. Yeah, roll again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to pet it, and as your hand gets close, it rears back and opens its beak a bit, and you pet it, and the eyes squint very tightly, and then eventually it's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scritches, yeah, scritches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The feathers furl up a little bit and it tends to poof. It seems like it's enjoying it begrudgingly, like it's really trying not to but it's like, oh, this does feel good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're so much alike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have it, and just keep him on your shoulder all the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can train him to fly and come back to me, and be cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so glad that this is happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want you to understand, you're going to have to feed it, take care of it, clean up after it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, Fjord!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I take out a little metal wire, and I add to this conversation and say, you are responsible for this animal's stealth checks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you are not interested, please let us know. We do have travel to get—"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, I want the weasel!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want the owl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Weasel. Owl. All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're leaving the puppy behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "20 gold pieces from each of you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're leaving the sweet-- you're leaving the puppy behind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're going to get the dog, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're going to split the cost of the dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. That is 140 gold total."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. This is so many-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 70 gold each. 60 gold each.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 60 gold each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, wait, hold on. (counting) So it's 140, so it is 70 gold each.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to make a giant alligator so happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we start a pool about which animal dies first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weasel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or lost. Just lost.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is-- in my daughter's campaign of eight-year-olds, all the girls are like, "Can I have a pet?" It's just like that with these two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I did. All right, so Jester has a crimson weasel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a weasel!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the name of my dope owl? What's he called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever you want to call him."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what's his breed? What's his color?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a white owl? He's a barn owl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He'd be more akin visually to a great horned owl, except for, because it comes from a more temperate region, here on the Menagerie coast, the feathers are more lithe. The body is less large, and it's more elongated and thin, and the tail feathers are a little longer, and the beak itself has a very, very sharp-- like more than usual sharp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got a tattoo on his left wing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as he pulls up and goes (inhales).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just Icarus tattooed on his wing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's got a spiderweb right in the armpit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's 140 gold away. "And I'm going to warn you--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "--this puppy is rambunctious and--" As he's making the transaction. He's not going to tell you after the fact like a tool. "You must be diligent and begin to train it to know who is home. Or else you lose it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So begin training it now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we name him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no. What do we name him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's too much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not against it. Yeah. Nugget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nugget the blink dog. All right, so mark that somewhere. You have your crimson weasel, you have your owl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what about the owl and the weasel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll think about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing is more important than this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is no rush. Thank you very much for your commerce. If there is no other purchases, we will continue our journey northward."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good luck to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you as well, tall friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Put it up." Everyone gets back into the carts, puts the rest of the creatures away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we feed them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what do I feed it? Can we get a carrying crate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The carts roll to a stop and (whistles), one of the hands comes over, and this younger woman, the one who's been helping with the birds, comes over with two small satchels. One, hands it to you, and it is filled with about ten dried-out rat corpses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mice, yeah. Cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't let Nott find that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one is filled with what looks to be bits of dried jerky and dried fruit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that for the dog or—

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the dog and/or the weasel, based on what you want to do. The cart continues northward and is out of your periphery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you double guns weasel and dog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got the weasel up here and the dog right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's his name? Poof? Nugget?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget. And we are home. Always blink to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check on the blink dog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, he's going to blink away immediately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Into a tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Be cruel, Matt. Do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It blinks out of your hand, and you feel this weight up in your horns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over and see it's slipping off of her horn trying to hold on as its hind legs are kicking up, trying to get leverage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got you, it's okay! It's okay! Oh my god, I love him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (dog barks)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a dog. What the fuck did we just do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, why did we do this?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. This was like a Renn Faire purchase.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it totally was! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you got goldfished.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you guys are wandering back, Caleb is giving Jester the vaguest stink eye as he scritches Frumpkin's head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a pet! We have another pet!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is super. Good for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As soon as one of these animals runs away, we'll actually be nine of us. That's really exciting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why do you bring up the number of people in the party?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, the name of the group is kind of a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guess I've never really thought about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus Christ, three animals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys—

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No apartment is letting us in now, ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cannot get approved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus three animals. Not one, maybe two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A very special episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did we do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know why we did that. Now we've got to think of a name!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten extra legs now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, here, have some Tamagotchi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah! Fuck. I really want an over-under on how long it takes to lose one of those fucking things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep the blink dog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eat the weasel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At least one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott now has a full-on ALF dynamic with some of these creatures. I'm pretty excited about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was fun. I'm excited to pick up in a couple weeks, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A couple weeks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! We'll be back for the main story and the experience of the arrival in Nicodranas the first week of September, the first Thursday of September. Next week, however, we do have the awesome Liam O'Brien running a one-shot with these three wonderful folks, with Laura, Travis and Sam, and two fantastic guests joining for that. So check that out next week on Thursday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And next week is also the premiere of Handbooker Helper, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next Wednesday, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wednesday.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lot going on here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ramping up. Getting all of our stuff in the can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And our best wishes to you three as you disappear into the desert.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Very necessary reset button.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Work hard, play hard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't put your dick in the peanut butter too much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You always say yes to putting your dick in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I said no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Peanut butter and playa dust, though? Nah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's not doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's the PB&J cart, it works fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. In your mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You eat like a fourth of a cup of playa dust at the end of that week. At least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It becomes part of your bloodstream at that point. Anyway, guys, have a wonderful week. We love you, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fucking got pets?! [music]
